titles.title: To make permanent the estate tax provisions enacted as part of the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.
To make permanent the estate tax provisions enacted as part of the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010 to make permanent the estate, gift, and generation-skipping transfer tax revisions of such Act.
